about.intro:
Welcome to my resume! My name is Danil and i'm a young, but no less confident developer in the field of web programming. And all because I am ready to achieve the necessary goals, I strive to study modern technologies, invent and create something of my own.

 I mainly specialize in building cascading user interfaces and basically fronted part of an application, with a really beautiful architecture using JavaScript component frameworks like the great Vue.js and the inimitable React.

basic.title: HTML / CSS
basic.description: I can type almost any responsive template using pure HTML, CSS or using post and preprocessors like Pug, Jade, Stylus, SASS and so on. If only I was given a sensible web designer. Also, I am familiar with such Css frameworks as Materialize, Bootstrap, Semantic UI.

basic.title: JS frameworks
basic.description: I've been friends with JavaScript component frameworks for about two years now. I give my preference to Vue and React. I believe that I am well versed in the main issues regarding the development of user interfaces and the creation of full-fledged SPA applications.

basic.title: Backend
basic.description: As an API for my web applications, I mostly use pure PHP hosted on an Apache or Nnginx web server, but also had development experience using Node.js.

basic.title: Database
basic.description: In my practice, I used the following databases: MariaDB, PostgreSQL, Microsoft SQL Server. From NoSQL, this is MongoDB, and in addition to this Cloud Firestore and Realtime Database from Firebase.
